name: Wierd: The Game: The Demo!
storyline: In a galaxy far, far away, in an unknown time, a (little) hero starts a long journey to free his planet from the evil occupying it
summary:
Wierd is an IWBTG inspired platformer, that pays homage to some titles by adding little references of them (such as Dark Souls, Mario, Downwell, Flappy bird, etc) while keeping a NES style. 
This merged into an unfair monster full of unfair traps and weird level design. Not for the light-hearted or the easily annoyed, this game tried to portray what a game really is, a challange.
